mapper.select: select members.fcm_token, subscription.member_id, group_concat(business.name) as shop_name, subscription.subscription_day, subscription.subscription_time from ( select member_id, shop_id, subscription_day, date_format(subscription_time, '%H:%i') as subscription_time from planb.tbl_subscription where subscription_day = #{subscriptionDay} and subscription_time = #{subscriptionTime} order by member_id limit #{_skiprows}, #{_pagesize} ) subscription inner join planb.tbl_members members on subscription.member_id = members.id, (select id, name from planb.tbl_business_info) business where business.id = subscription.shop_id group by subscription.member_id, subscription.subscription_day, subscription.subscription_time
mapper.insert: insert into planb.tbl_subscription (member_id, shop_id, address_id, subscription_day, subscription_time) values (#{memberId}, #{shopId}, #{addressId}, #{subscriptionDay}, #{subscriptionTime})

insert into planb.tbl_subscription_menu_option (subscription_id, subscription_menu_id, menu_option_id) values
(#{subscriptionId}, #{menuId}, #{item})
